jury.title: Service designer at Finn
jury.intro: Lorem ipsum, a short n cool intro. Not to many characters, but some is fine. It's Friday and I wanna go home.

lookingFor.value: Solutions that look at a greater picture and work holistically to reach a clear goal
Get to know and empathise with your user
Don't "just" make MVPs make a MLP (Most lovable solution)

bio.value: Currently working as service design lead at FINN.no
Loves people, they can be so weird
Have Shiba named Link

jury.name: Dimitrios Platis
jury.title: Nice title
jury.intro: Second jury duty for Ariot and eager to experience the passion, teamwork, cool tech and hacks!

lookingFor.value: Works for Edument in Gothenburg as a software engineering consultant. Usually within embedded systems.
Likes teaching. Delivers courses on beginner and advanced C++ at Edument and Systems Development at the University of Gothenburg.
Works on open source hobby projects and blogs about them. Preferrably the entire product stack, from software to hardware.

bio.value: Software & hardware best practices. Yes, it is a quick & dirty prototype, but can it go live soon?
Innovative solutions for pragmatic business cases. Can you think out of the box to solve a real problem?
Edge computing on low-end IoT. Can you run inference on an cheap microcontroller?

jury.name: Kaja Helene Kristiansen
jury.title: Developer at EGGS Design
jury.intro: Forth year helping out with Ariot, and are ready to make this the best year yet.

lookingFor.value: Geeky and fun stuff! This is a place where you can create want YOU want, and not what the typical client want.
Good design. Would love to see more design in this competition, service, interaction and graphic. Bring it!
Good craftmanship. Take pride in what you create. If you like what you are doing, it shows in the product!

bio.value: Can most probably name all the Pokemons, but has problem with remembering how to write media queries without looking it up first.
Has newly started a new job as a frontend developer in EGGS Design, working in the Creative Tech department
Also have a shiba inu, he's named Momo. Momo means 'peach' in Japanese

bio.value: She is a weird designer potato – a hybrid between interaction-, product- and service designer

She loves the forest, and to walk with a dog among the trees

Great energy and comradeship in the teams
Those corky solutions that makes her laugh
